item.title: Software Engineer - Linux Network Programming - Sunnyvale or SF (sunnyvale)
item.description:
Software Engineer - Linux Network Programming - Sunnyvale or SF

Responsible for the design, implementation and maintenance of the network integration part of Riverbed products. Will work with a team to implement the features that allow our products to work with the diverse networks our customer shave from a small office to a large redundant data center.  Familiar with linux kernel programming and networking in general.  Requires a BS in CS/EE with at least 2 years of programming experience. MS preferred.

Desired Skills:
  • Very strong C/C++
  • Experience with programming Linux kernel modules
  • Experience with Linux TCP/IP stack
  • Knowledge of socket programming, multithreaded programming
  • Knowledge of TCP/IP plus any of Routing protocols, NAT, WCCP
  • Familiar with Routers, Switches, NAT devices, Proxies, Firewalls

No sponsorship or transfer of visas available at this time.

If you are interested, please send an email with attached resume to the address above or to our website at www.riverbed.com/company/careers. Riverbed Technology, Inc. is a San Francisco and Sunnyvale company near CalTrain, Muni and BART, with excellent salary, options and benefits. We are proud to be an EEO/AA employer M/F/D/V.
